terms.preferredTerm: UPDRS - Motor Examination: Gait

terms.definition: Unified Parkinson's Disease Rating Scale - Motor examination: Postural stability (Response to sudden, strong posterior displacement produced by pull on shoulders while patient erect with eyes open and feet slightly apart. Patient is prepared.).
terms.preferredTerm: UPDRS - Motor Examination: Postural Stability

terms.preferredTerm: UPDRS - Motor Examination: Body Bradykinesia and Hypokinesia

terms.definition: Unified Parkinson's Disease Rating Scale - Complications of therapy (in the past week): Dyskinesias, Duration: What proportion of the waking day are dyskinesias present? (Historical information.).
terms.preferredTerm: UPDRS - Complications of Therapy: Dyskinesias - Duration

terms.definition: Unified Parkinson's Disease Rating Scale - Complications of therapy (in the past week): Dyskinesias, Disability: How disabling are the dyskinesias? (Historical information; may be modified by office examination.).
terms.preferredTerm: UPDRS - Complications of Therapy: Dyskinesias - Disability

terms.definition: Unified Parkinson's Disease Rating Scale - Complications of therapy (in the past week): Dyskinesias, Painful dyskinesias: How painful are the dyskinesias?
terms.preferredTerm: UPDRS - Complications of Therapy: Dyskinesias - Painful Dyskinesias

terms.definition: Unified Parkinson's Disease Rating Scale - Complications of therapy (in the past week): Dyskinesias, Presence of early morning dystonia (Historical information.).
terms.preferredTerm: UPDRS - Complications of Therapy: Dyskinesias - Presence of Early Morning Dystonia

terms.definition: Unified Parkinson's Disease Rating Scale - Complications of therapy (in the past week): Clinical fluctuations, Are 'off' periods predictable?
terms.preferredTerm: UPDRS - Complications of Therapy: Clinical Fluctuations - Off Periods Predictable

terms.definition: Unified Parkinson's Disease Rating Scale - Complications of therapy (in the past week): Clinical fluctuations, Are 'off' periods unpredictable?
terms.preferredTerm: UPDRS - Complications of Therapy: Clinical Fluctuations - Off Periods Unpredictable

terms.definition: Unified Parkinson's Disease Rating Scale - Complications of therapy (in the past week): Clinical fluctuations, Do 'off' periods come on suddenly, within a few seconds?
terms.preferredTerm: UPDRS - Complications of Therapy: Clinical Fluctuations - Off Periods Sudden

terms.definition: Unified Parkinson's Disease Rating Scale - Complications of therapy (in the past week): Clinical fluctuations, What proportion of the waking day is the patient 'off' on average?
terms.preferredTerm: UPDRS - Complications of Therapy: Clinical Fluctuations - Average Off Periods Per Day

terms.definition: Unified Parkinson's Disease Rating Scale - Complications of therapy (in the past week): Other complications, Does the patient have anorexia, nausea, or vomiting?
terms.preferredTerm: UPDRS - Complications of Therapy: Other Complications - Anorexia, Nausea, or Vomiting

terms.definition: Unified Parkinson's Disease Rating Scale - Complications of therapy (in the past week): Other complications, Any sleep disturbances, such as insomnia or hypersomnolence?
terms.preferredTerm: UPDRS - Complications of Therapy: Other Complications - Sleep Disturbances

terms.definition: Unified Parkinson's Disease Rating Scale - Complications of therapy (in the past week): Other complications, Does the patient have symptomatic orthostasis? (Record the patient's blood pressure, height and weight on the scoring form).
terms.preferredTerm: UPDRS - Complications of Therapy: Other Complications - Symptomatic Orthostasis
